channel.title: Mi Pad 5 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Mi Pad 5 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V12.5.7.0.RKXCNXM Fastboot update for Mi Pad 5 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi Pad 5 China

Codename: nabu

Version: V12.5.7.0.RKXCNXM | 11.0

Size: 3.8 GB

MD5: efc58a95ad0e2c9459a749fbae43d7a0

Changelog:
[Notes]
New: Rotate and scale the items selected by the stylus
New: Black background for handwritten notes
New: Designated folder for the notes made with a stylus
New: Text recognition for handwritten notes
New: Switch writing tools and adjust stroke width by pressing the stylus buttons
Optimization: Overall stability
[Themes]
Optimization: Default wallpaper
[Camera]
Fix: HDR stability
[Gallery]
New: Keyboard shortcuts
New: Marker, pen, and eraser for editing screenshots
Optimization: Taking and editing screenshots is more convenient now
[Music]
New: Music player in the Control center
New: Audio playback can now be cast to other devices via the Control center
Optimization: Landscape mode in Mi Music
[Weather]
Optimization: Managing locations
[Stylus & keyboard]
New: Partial screenshots
New: System shortcuts
Optimization: The process of pairing a stylus
Optimization: Settings for keyboards and styluses
[Split screen]
Fix: Split screen didn't always work normally
[Recents]
New: Apps can now be opened in a floating window in Recents
[Calendar]
Optimization: Month view
Optimization: Animations for switching between different views
Optimization: The process of creating an event
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Optimization: Switching between different refresh rates in different scenes

Download: Here
